Description:
Notice HS/20220324/MPS01 /312393474- IN served - You have failed to ensure that measures are taken which are effective to prevent access to the KRV 2000 vertical mill because there are no measures e.g. table guard or chuck guard to prevent access to the rotating chuck or tool.

Notice HS/20220324/MPS02 / 312393527 - IN served - You have failed to ensure that your local exhaust ventilation plant provided on your lathes to control exposure to substances hazardous to health, namely coolant mist, has undergone a thorough examination and test within the last 14 months.
